title: Way ahead
creator_credit: Kim Dalton, South Australian Film Corporation and Robert Walker
brief_description: A look at the ever increasing problems of the motor car and its alternative, public transport. New improvements in public transport systems throughout the world are examined. Other new ideas, still in the planning stages, are also shown. Animation is ;used to show a possible futurisitic solution of personalised rapid transit. Cinematography by John Leake.
